meta.initiative: Nooterra Trust OS v1 State-of-the-Art Launch
northStarMetrics: Paid run deterministic verification pass rate

epics.Description: Ship a fast, deterministic, non-dead-end setup flow that reaches first verified receipt with minimal decisions.
Make login/session/bootstrap flows robust across public and enterprise deployment modes.

epics.Summary: Stabilize Managed Wallet Funding and First Paid Run
epics.Description: Ensure wallet setup, funding routes, and first paid execution run are reliable and diagnosable.
Harden settlement/reversal state transitions and retries under partial failures.
Ensure proof packets and offline verification are complete, deterministic, and support-friendly.

epics.Summary: Establish SRE and Incident Readiness Baseline
epics.Description: Define and enforce SLOs, alerts, rehearsals, and rollback automation for launch confidence.
Close key authz and abuse vectors with explicit controls and adversarial testing.
Turn launch into a controlled operating system with scorecards, playbooks, and support loops.

tickets.Description: Publish setup lifecycle states, transitions, and deterministic rollback points.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: State machine and transition table are published; invalid transitions fail closed in tests.

tickets.Description: Map top setup failures to stable error codes and exact remediations.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Top 20 failure classes emit stable codes and remediation commands.

tickets.Description: Ensure failed branches always return to a valid next choice without repeated default traps.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: No loop repro in scripted TTY harness; all failures expose actionable next path.

tickets.Description: Support public signup mode and enterprise pre-provisioned tenant mode with explicit detection.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Mode is detected and surfaced; invalid mode returns deterministic guidance.

tickets.Description: Ensure runtime bootstrap can use session cookie or bootstrap key with identical output schema.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Both paths mint runtime key and emit identical MCP env contract.

tickets.Description: Define and implement explicit conflict rules for tenant IDs and optional global email uniqueness mode.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: 409 conflict behavior is deterministic and documented for all conflict classes.

tickets.Description: Define and enforce card/bank/transfer funding states and terminal outcomes.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Funding path emits deterministic state and reason for every failure/success branch.

tickets.Summary: Add first paid run post-setup verifier
tickets.Description: Run and validate one paid call immediately after setup with operator-friendly status output.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Wizard outputs green or actionable red with receipt IDs and next command.

tickets.Description: Measure drop-off points from setup to funded wallet to first verified receipt.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Dashboard shows step conversion and median step durations by host.

tickets.Description: Block duplicate side effects across settlement/reversal retries.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Retry matrix passes with zero duplicate financial mutations.

tickets.Description: Generate deterministic timeline packet for every dispute and reversal decision.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Packet replays offline and yields same verdict under same inputs.

tickets.Description: Guarantee rerun safety and explicit idempotency status for batch jobs.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Rerun output reports unchanged financial state and idempotent hit counters.

tickets.Description: Lock required fields and references across decision, binding, receipt, and verification artifacts.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Schema and examples are frozen; verifier accepts only compliant packets.

tickets.Description: Provide a concise verification result that support and finance can consume quickly.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Single command prints deterministic verdict + failing checks with stable codes.

tickets.Description: Expose receipt lineage traversal for run-level debugging and audit workflows.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Endpoint returns complete lineage from gate to verification artifact IDs.

tickets.Description: Stand up launch-critical SLO dashboard with latency, availability, and failure mode views.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Dashboard covers all launch scorecard P0/P1 runtime metrics.

tickets.Description: Execute staged rollback drill and record timing plus decision points.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Rehearsal completes within RTO target and produces post-drill action list.

tickets.Description: Produce automated weekly scorecard from runtime and CI artifacts.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Gate report generates deterministically and blocks release on P0 failure.

tickets.Summary: Expand adversarial setup and payment tests
tickets.Description: Add abuse-focused test scenarios for replay, malformed payloads, and tool poisoning attempts.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: New adversarial suite is mandatory in launch CI and fails closed.

tickets.Description: Strengthen redaction and CI scanning for API keys, tokens, and sensitive traces.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: No secret-like token appears in logs/artifacts under test corpus.

tickets.Description: Verify high-risk routes reject non-privileged principals consistently.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All high-risk endpoints return deterministic forbidden codes for under-scoped principals.

tickets.Description: Document launch-day operational rhythm, ownership, escalation, and comms templates.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Runbook is dry-run tested with assigned owners and escalation timings.

tickets.Description: Classify top onboarding failures and map to deterministic fixes/support macros.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Top 10 issue classes have approved resolution path and SLA owner.

tickets.Description: Execute final review against scorecard with design partners and release committee.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Review captures GO/NO-GO verdict and mitigation list for any conditional gates.
